entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:07 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 09:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -8.2°C
Wind: W 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
